title: Premium chest bug/error
body:
Hello!

Almost 5 days ago I sent a ticket talking about a error with the client (hextech store or whatever it is the case) but two times I see some activity in the thread but no answer at all so here I am because I see rioters helping others.

So I was in my account lvling and getting enough IP for the champion I desire (I didnt buy any champion until this one) so I was very happy about my 6300 Ip (kinda 6373 or smt like that) and bought my champion, everything was fine and cool when I open my hextech store and open the first chest it was garen, ashe and a skin for ashe, totally cool nothing weird but when I open the premium chest (a skin for an' owned champ and blablabla) everything was wrong.

It was a skin for Soraka and not the champion... the ONLY champion I bought.

I know it was not my mistake (the server was very laggy and the client slow af so I think this was a weird bug or something like that) and I didnt open anything with NO champions at all and I said everything in the ticket and here... please help.

Sorry for broken english. Sorry for being impatient but I dont want to play untill this is solve :/ I lost motivation for lvling because of this.

replies.body:
It seems you didn't get a reply to your ticket yet because you replied ("bumped") it before a specialist responded, which sent it to the back of the queue. I can answer your question here, though. 

The Hextech Chest content that you open is essentially random, with the only modifier being that it prioritizes giving you content that you don't already own. Check out our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for complete details on this system.

Let me know if you have any questions.
